catalog.name: Unidata THREDDS Data Server - Radar Data

datasetScan.name: NEXRAD Level III Radar
datasetScan.documentation: The NIDS data feed from the IDD provides roughly 75 radar products sent every 5-10 minutes from 154 sites. These "derived" products include base reflectivity and velocity, composite reflectivity, precipitation estimates, echo tops and VAD winds.

datasetScan.name: TDWR Level III Radar
datasetScan.documentation: The TDWR data feed from the IDD provides radar products generated from the FAA Terminal Doppler Weather Radars (TDWR), which are separate from NEXRAD. These "derived" products include base reflectivity and velocity, echo tops, and precipitation amounts.

metadata.documentation: The NEXRAD Level II feed from the IDD provides raw radar volume data collected from the NWS WSR-88Ds. Data are available approximately every 5 minutes in precipitation mode, and ten minutes in clear air mode

variable.name: Reflectivity
variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar > Radar Reflectivity

variable.name: Velocity
variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar > Doppler Velocity

variable.name: SpectrumWidth

variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar >

variable.name: DifferentialPhase
variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar >

variable.name: CorrelationCoefficient
variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar >

metadata.documentation: NEXRAD Radar National Composites of Level 3 products. Generated by Unidata every 5 minutes.

variable.vocabulary_name: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Radar > Radar Reflectivity
